tooltip.gem_fabric.luft_gem.shift-down: When you use this Item, nearby mobs fly towards the clouds
tooltip.gem_fabric.teleport_gem.shift-do: You use this Item like an Ender Pearl
tooltip.gem_fabric.orange_gem.shift-down: When you use this Item, nearby mobs are getting damage, depending on your fall distance
tooltip.gem_fabric.heilungs_gem.shift-do: When you use this Item, you can't die for 1 minute
